unnormalised: Arrey yaar, crypto-nt invest korun mhaka Rs. 5000 pan buddle! Aata hanv puranne FD-nk portun gela, interest rate 6.5% p.a. aslyaari. Kamit kamit hanv uzo korun pollyana mhaji jivnachich kamai lagnak jailebi kitek utarillea vellun vegin naash zallem! Kaaykuch hanv India vs. Pakistan match-acher betting kartan; thaya bhau bhari odds asata, hanv tuka sangtam.
normalised: Arrey yaar, crypto-nt invest korun mhaje panch hazar rupey duble! Aata hanv parat purok F-D-k, tori interest rate fakt saa point panch percent prati varsh asa. Kam se kam mhak zopetle utthun disona ki mhajem jivitallem poisa lagna-vellachi jalebi poryan vegim vanish zata mhunn! Hanyak zai astaa India versus Pakistan match-acher betting korun ravonk; thodde bore odds asat, mhanntam hanv tuka.
